jump_scares.spoiler: Nina turns around and Beth is standing right behind her. [Video]
Nina looks around while masturbating and sees her mother sleeping in the chair beside her bed
Nina backs into a nurse while in Beth’s hospital room
Nina looks up from underneath the water in the bathtub and sees another version of herself staring back at her. [Video]
A shadowy figure crosses a hallway in front of Nina
Beth stabs herself in the cheek
Nina turns on the kitchen light and there is a bloodied figure standing in the corner. [Video]
Nina turns on a light and her mother’s paintings begin to talk
Lily suddenly sits up and grabs Nina around the neck
